Company Description

Welcome to a world, where your ideas lead to something big. Welcome to Bosch! 

Do you want beneficial technologies being shaped by your ideas? Whether in the areas of mobility solutions, consumer goods, industrial technology or energy and building technology – with us, you will have the chance to improve quality of life all across the globe. Lund is Bosch´s newest site in Sweden; it´s a development center with around 180 engineers developing connected mobile products. Welcome to Bosch.

Job Description

You will be part of a team developing software for embedded connectivity solutions for the use case of Firmware Over The Air updates. The team is part of an international organization delivering value adding connectivity solutions for OEMs within the automotive industry. Agile working methods is a foundation in our way of working and to deliver larger solutions together with other teams we use the Scaled Agile Framework.

As a SCRUM / Agile Master you:

	Are responsible for facilitating daily scrum, sprint planning, sprint demo and retrospective meetings.
	Use your skills for conflict resolution, communicate using scrum values such as openness, honesty and respect.
	Coach international teams from different cultures.
	Create the environment for the agile teams with focus on open communication and take the task mindset.
	Need to forecast the numbers of deliverables possible in an iteration, which is based on evidence and reliable source.
	Need to be the expert of estimation and planning. You should possess the knowledge of how to create useful, reliable and practical plans for software development projects.
	Engage and be active in our agile forum at office level.

Qualifications

	Technical understanding.
	Working practically and communicating in a structured way.
	Convinced that verification is as important as implementation.
	Being a people person (help, inspire and engage the team members to overcome obstacles).
	Good skills in English is mandatory, written and verbal.

Differentiating:

	Automotive background.
	Certified SAFe Scrum Master.
	Experience in Functional Safety.
	Experience of embedded software development.

Additional Information

Your future job location offers you:

Flexible worktime options, benefits and services, medical services, employee discounts, various sports and health opportunities, catering facilities, access to local public transport, room for creativity, urban infrastructures, rural surroundings.

Diversity is our strength! At Bosch we look at diversity in gender, generation, nationalities and culture as our advantage. We believe mixed teams to be more successful because they utilize the potential offered by different perspectives and solution strategies. We therefore promote mixed teams at all levels and draw on the entire talent pool.
